input.sentences: so while we were out of town | i had to take a few pictures of these strange items i found in this shop .
stuffed | pirate block head with a yellow nose | keychain ?
the face on this doll was a bit horrifying .
double punch was the name of the store .
and these earrings were actually adorable .
output.sentences: In town there a very strange shop.
It has a yellow stuffed pirate in the front window.
And a horrifying pit filled with dolls missing their eyes.
There store lets you punch the pirate if you pay double for your items.
Even being strange I like because they always have adorable earrings.
